name: Sunshine
description: An Android weather forecast app that utilizes [OpenWeatherMap's API](https://openweathermap.org/API) using the knowledge gained from [Udacity's course: Developing Android Apps](https://www.udacity.com/course/new-android-fundamentals--ud851).

name: Web crawler
description: A script to crawl the web using Google's **PageRank** algorithm.

name: Personal web app
description: A web app hosted on [Google App Engine **Standard** Environment](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/standard) which has a blog, a registration system and **RESTful APIs** in JSON & XML formats. It utilizes memcache to have almost zero read from Google Datastore in order to speed up data retrieval.

name: Chirp
description: A Twitter clone using the **MEAN stack** (MongoDB, Express, Angular & Node).

name: Sur News
description: An Android app that fetches local news about Sur using [jsoup library](https://jsoup.org).

name: Yamba
description: A micro blogging app created while learning from [Android Bootcamp Series](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLE08A97D36D5A255F).

name: mimic
description: A web framework that implements the [WSGI interface](http://docs.webob.org/en/latest/do-it-yourself.html).
